title: Rejecting the Trap

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I don't buy the neuroscience trap at all. But obviously there are others out there, you included.
dialogue.context: Evan rejects reductionist neuroscience while recognizing others accept it

scene_context: In a 2-panel format, Evan asserts his rejection of neuroscientific reductionism while acknowledging the AI and others embrace this view.
philosophical_theme: The divide between those who accept and reject materialist explanations of consciousness
visual_elements: Two panels contrasting Evan's stance with acknowledgment of other perspectives
